forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of patchy fog early. Cloudy. High around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 37F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High around 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers or flurries. Low around 0C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low 33F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to lingering snow showers during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy with snow showers around before midnight. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers will become more widely scattered later on. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 23F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional snow showers later during the night. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low 26F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some rain and snow throughout the day. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low around 25F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers mixing with rain in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Some snow showers early will give way to a mix of wintry precipitation in the afternoon. High near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers mainly during the evening. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few snow showers developing late. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with scattered snow and rain showers. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.
